title: Hold-ups as A55 shut near Broughton
content:
A serious accident has closed the A55 westbound on the Chester-Flintshire border at Broughton, reports Traffic Wales. 

Traffic is said to be queuing between the Broughton Shopping Park junction and the Posthouse Hotel roundabout. 

Highways officials said police are on the scene and working to put a diversion in place. 

No further details are known.
